Tolkien-related events that took place in 1982.

content.title: January
content.content:
5 - Hans Conried, who voiced Thorin in The Hobbit (1977 film), dies.
28 - The Old English Exodus, by J.R.R. Tolkien, is published.
28 - Angmar: Land of the Witch King is published.

content.title: February
content.content: 'The Tengwar Numerals', an article by Christopher Tolkien is published in Quettar 13

content.title: June
content.content:
21 - Actor Benjamin Walker is born.
28 - Artist Ray Dillon is born.
? - Mallorn 18 is published.

content.title: August
content.content:
13-16 - Mythcon 13.
14 - Dorothy Whitelock, former colleague of J.R.R. Tolkien, dies.
? - Amon Hen 57 is published.

content.title: September
content.content:
19 - The article "The Return of Tolkien" is published in The Sunday Times Magazine.
20 - Mr. Bliss is published in the UK.
24-26 - Oxonmoot 1982.

content.title: November
content.content: ? - Melbourne House publishes The Hobbit (1982 video game).

content.title: December
content.content:
? - Amon Hen 59 is published.
? - Mallorn 19 is published.

? - Artist Marya Filatova is born.
? - 1983 Fantasy Calendar released.
? - An Artist's Interpretation of Middle Earth is published.
? - Umbar: Haven of the Corsairs is published.
? - The Court of Ardor is published.
